main event: A UFO sighting occurred in Bryn Mawr, Pennsylvania, on 27 April 1955, where a bright light varying in color and shape was observed.
interesting points: The sighting was reported to last approximately 10 minutes., The object changed shape from round to cigar-shaped to boomerang-shaped., The object was described to have brilliant coloring and appeared to hover in the sky., Witnesses reported the object making no sound during the sighting., The sighting garnered attention from local police and was documented in a U.S. newspaper.
sighted object: a bright light varying in color and shape
witness description: The witness described the object as being between the size of a basketball and a baseball and observed it changing colors and shapes.
